vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κόκκ-ῐνος, η, ον,
scarlet, [NT+3rd c.BC+]blushing, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II substantive κόκκινα, τά, scarlet clothes, ἐν κ. περιπατεῖν, κ. φορεῖν, [LXX+2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: scarlet, (bright) red; in some contexts, cloth that is scarlet or (bright) red (<ref='Rev.18.12,16'>Rev 18:12,16</ref>)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
scarlet, (bright) red; in some contexts, cloth that is scarlet or (bright) red (Rev 18:12,16)
dyed with coccus, crimson, scarlet, Mt. 27:28; Heb. 9:19; Rev. 17:3, 4; 18:12, 16*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
深紅色的, 鮮紅色的. 一種由"ilex coccifera"( 胭脂蟲)的卵所聚成,
其形狀像是一團穀粒或莓子. 可收集磨碎後作紅色的染料使用
(蒲林尼, AD. 23-79, 羅馬學者, 拉丁名 Gaius Plinius Secundus)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
深红色的, 鲜红色的. 一种由"ilex coccifera"( 胭脂虫)的卵所聚成,
其形状像是一团谷粒或莓子. 可收集磨碎后作红色的染料使用
(蒲林尼, AD. 23-79, 罗马学者, 拉丁名Gaius Plinius Secundus)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đỏ tươi; đỏ mặt tía tai
